Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
